content: this pattern is based off of the pink cat beanie shinee s key wore yesterday <3 this is also my first time writing a pattern so if you have questions or need clarification let me know this beanie is worked in the round with half-double crochets the earflaps are joined to the bottom and worked in row after the body is finished i ve only made this using measurements for myself it fits snugly on a 22 circumference head and could probably stretch to fit an adult large depending on your gauge
